response.answer_text: It’s confusing for beginner’s. I tell you a trick. You don’t know what number is big. So here there is an unknown operator which I will user empty square brackets to represent []. So in your case, -75 [] -77 => 2 [] 0 [Adding 77 each side] => 2 > 0 [don’t you know why 2 is greater that 0] That’s why -75 is greater that 0 as Jackline Mtwange has answered
That depends on context and perspective. If you stay in “negative land” than -77 is larger. As soon as positive numbers are in play -75 is the larger number.
